parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Sets the colorDisabled attribute of a control.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetDisabledColor]] [idc, color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Color]] - RGBA Color

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[ctrlSetDisabledColor]] color

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> color: [[Color]] - RGBA Color

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetDisabledColor]] [0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetActiveColor]] [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [[ctrlTextColor]]
</value></part></template></root>
